ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Closed Won" stage of Opportunities in the "Project" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Project', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Commitment_Received__c,""), ISBLANK(Customer_PO_Received__c), NOT( Order_Entry_Approved__c), NOT(PO_Approved__c), ISBLANK(SO_Number__c), ISBLANK( Quotation_Issued__c), NOT(Export_Control_Check__c), ISBLANK(Quotation_Number__c), ISBLANK(Sequence_of_Events__c), NOT(Proposal_price_Authorized__c), ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), NOT(X3rd_Party_Buyouts_Required__c), ISPICKVAL(Non_standard_Products_Approved__c,""), /*ISBLANK(Application__c),*/ ISPICKVAL(GMP_Category__c,""), ISBLANK(Category_of_Interest__c), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Commitment Received, Customer PO Received, Order Entry Approved, PO Approved and SO Number are mandatory fields to move to Close Won stage
